title: Setup
text: goal tarflow.iquizoo provide workflow auto-generation IQUIZOO data powered targets package.

title: Setup
text: preprocessing IQUIZOO data used harduous datasets disorganized. Newer version database games make things much better. Now package called preproc.iquizoo, containing required functions used preprocessing. facilitates analysis significantly. now, advent targets, can easily setup workflows automate preprocessing! package . Hopefully, make analysis IQUIZOO data favorable thing.

title: Setup
text: can install development version GitHub :

title: Setup
text: package essentially providing several rmarkdown templates use. See article understand open new template. Currently two templates provided: "fetch-iquizoo" (“Fetch Iquizoo Data”): Fetch data whole, appropriate raw data preprocessing. "fetch-iquizoo-branches" (“Fetch Iquizoo Data Separately”): Fetch data separately games, appropriate raw data preprocessing.

title: Insert where configurations — insert_where

title: Insert where configurations — insert_where
text: old old configuration. ... new element. Can list data.frame class. Note must name "table". , make work properly whole project, names c("table", "field", "operator", "values"). replace Replace element table value . Default set replace, set FALSE add anyway (recommended, might cause error analysis). game_id identifier game set limitation.

what: Download (pick up) datasets from given database — pickup
title: Download (pick up) datasets from given database — pickup
text: Based template query file "clause" configuration, datasets extracted given database.

title: Download (pick up) datasets from given database — pickup
code: pickup(   query_file,   config_where = NULL,   dsn = "iquizoo-v3",   groups = "iquizoo-v3",   drv = getOption("tarflow.driver"),   encoding = "utf-8" )

title: Download (pick up) datasets from given database — pickup
text: query_file File name sql query. Literal query acceptable, recognized literal query, input must string containing least one new line. config_where Configuration "-clause" sql query. Can list (mostly config.yml file) data.frame. dsn data source name ODBC database connector. See odbc::dbConnect() information. Used drv set odbc::odbc(). groups Section identifier default.file. See RMariaDB::MariaDB() information. Used drv set odbc::odbc(). drv driver used. Set option "tarflow.driver" default currently odbc::odbc(). Options odbc::odbc() RMariaDB::MariaDB(), need pre-configurations. encoding Encoding assumed input strings. Default "UTF-8".

title: Download (pick up) datasets from given database — pickup
text: tibble downloaded data.

title: Download (pick up) datasets from given database — pickup
text: Liang Zhang

what: Feed Raw Data to Pre-processing — preproc_data
title: Feed Raw Data to Pre-processing — preproc_data
text: Calculate indices using data returned wrangle_data().

title: Feed Raw Data to Pre-processing — preproc_data
code: preproc_data(   data,   fn,   name_raw_parsed = "raw_parsed",   out_name_index = "index_name",   out_name_score = "score",   ... )

title: Feed Raw Data to Pre-processing — preproc_data
text: data tibble contains raw data. fn can function formula. See rlang::as_function() details. name_raw_parsed column name stores user's raw data format list data.frames. out_name_index column name used output storing name calculated index. out_name_score column name used output storing value calculated index. ... Additional arguments passed fn.

title: Feed Raw Data to Pre-processing — preproc_data
text: tibble contains calculated indices. index names stored column out_name_index, index values stored column out_name_score.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.5.4
text: Enhanced templates: now content_orginal_data_detail content_score_detail tables lived iqizoo_content_db database.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.5.3
text: Added tests. user-level updates.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.5.2
text: Fixed bug .onAttach() display incorrect message loading package.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.5.1
text: Fixed option "tarflow.driver" working. Removed ... argument connect_to_db() just internal function.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.5.0
text: default value option "tarflow.driver", find first available driver odbc RMariaDB. neither available, message prompted inform user install one.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.4.1
text: Added new argument add_keyword compose_where() allow adding keyword clause. useful want compose clause subquery.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.4.0
text: Removed search_games_mem() behave expected. Especially, memoise::forget() work. working version added rmarkdown template.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.4.0
text: Enhanced code quality.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.3.2
text: Fixed errors caused <integer64> class. Now data.iquizoo::game_info data returned pickup() stores game_id <integer64> class bit64 package, tarchetypes::tar_map() support class, convert <character> class workaround.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.3.1
text: Fixed recoverable error message pattern match cases.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.3.0
text: Implemented new udpations data.iquizoo package, now input extra configured game_info data package. Suggests {preproc.iquizoo} 2.4.0 higher now, require preprocessing functions support ..

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.3.0
text: Supported setting custom variable name parsed raw data.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.3.0
text: Fixed bug integer64 type.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.2.0
text: Now preproc_data() use purrr::possibly() suppress errors.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.1.0
text: Now parsed data nested data.frame() data, efficient (#50). Now pickup() support input literal sql query string argument query_file. recognized literal sql query, string must contains least one new line. Now raw data also fetch "game_version" column.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.0.0
text: Now preproc_data() returns indices tidyr::pivot_longer(), column names now "index_name" "score", consistent among games. Now wrangle_data() also changes character values lower case. better logic dealing data preprocessing preproc.iquizoo functions accept .input .extra inputs.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 1.0.1
text: Remove old content github README.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 1.0.0
text: init() related functions totally removed, deprecated "0.2.0" later. fetch() fetch_single_game() renamed pickup() pickup_single_game() avoid name masking DBI::fetch() (see #45).

title: tarflow.iquizoo 1.0.0
text: Fix bug preproc_data() occured using complex dplyr verbs (see #43).

title: tarflow.iquizoo 1.0.0
text: Added tests many core functions except pickup() (see #41).

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.2.1
text: Adapt new preproc.iquizoo data.iquizoo packages.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.2.1
text: Fix target name problem.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.2.0
text: Now init() deprecated, rmarkdown template recommended instead.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.2.0
text: Support setting pipeline rmarkdown using template (#35).

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.7
text: Removed calc_indices (#24) added wrangle_data() fit jobs package. new function parse input json string stack long format, keep meta info attribute "info" output. , output added subclass "tbl_meta" print() method.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.7
text: Added fetch_single_game() treat special case fetching dataset single game. used especially using branches. Unexported compose_where() insert_where(), just usage current package.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.6
text: Use stringr::str_detect() remove empty json string. Now "[]" "{}" removed.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.5
text: Fix issue empty json string removing empty (.e., "[]") json string data validation step calc_indices().

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.4
text: Fix issue invalid json string introducing data validation step calc_indices().

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.3
text: Fix issue data name case, now names translated lower-case ones preprocessing.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.2
text: New feature introduced huge change use_targets() removed. init() used replace . function, can define many schemas. Maybe future, logic modified better handle schemas.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.1
text: Fix encoding issue Windows system. Add new schema “original” download original data . Use new yaml configurations api. Support types config_where fetch_from_v3(). Besides list type, now can specify data.frame type even character type config_where. helpful config_where generated yaml config, R code directly. Rename fetch_from_v3() fetch(), API now fetch(query_file, config_where, dsn). say, can now pass data source name database . Export S3 method compose_where(), originally named compose_where_clause(). Support new argument separate use_targets() optionally separate fetching branches games. Support new argument ignore_tar use_targets() optionally ignore internal data targets package version control system (.e., “.gitignore”). Now use_targets() skip “config.yml” file silently already exists one. Moved internal data named game_info “dataproc.iquizoo (>= 0.2.6)” package.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.0.9001
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
